DOC.brief_summary: A total 18 healthy volunteer participate four-week , within-groups , double-blind , placebo-controlled study . The study two phase separate 4 15-day washout period . Subjects randomly assign receive either 40 mg atomoxetine placebo . For Phase I , subject assign atomoxetine placebo 4 day . After receive medication placebo three day , subject 6-hour laboratory session , responses physical psychological stress 20 mg/70 kg ( 20 mg maximum ) dose d-amphetamine measure . Several physiological , hormonal , subjective outcome measure obtain experimental session . Subjects 4-15 day washout period cross alternative treatment Phase II .
DOC.detailed_description: This pilot study examine effect norepinephrine reuptake blocker , atomoxetine , physiological subjective response physical psychological model stress oral amphetamine healthy volunteer . The physical stress model cold pressor test ( CPT ) psychological stress pace auditory serial addition task ( PASAT ) . Our overall hypothesis atomoxetine treatment , compare placebo , attenuate physiological subjective response stress d-amphetamine . 2 . Research Design : Double-blind , placebo-controlled , within-groups , outpatient study . 3 . Methodology : A total 18 healthy volunteer participate four-week , within-groups , double-blind , placebo-controlled study . The study two phase separate 4 15-day washout period . Subjects randomly assign receive either 40 mg atomoxetine placebo . For Phase I , subject assign atomoxetine placebo 4 day . After receive medication placebo three day , subject 6-hour laboratory session , responses physical psychological stress 20 mg/70 kg ( 20 mg maximum ) dose d-amphetamine measure . Several physiological , hormonal , subjective outcome measure obtain experimental session . Subjects 4-15 day washout period cross alternative treatment Phase II . 4 . Findings : Since last renewal , total 16 subject sign consent form . Among , 6 subject return sign consent form . An additional 2 subject randomize complete study . One subject start 3 time randomize 3 time therefore count three time enrollment . Currently still enrol subject . ( 2/7/07 ) Have complete study 10 subject , study publish . This study enter twice .
DOC.criteria: Female male age 18 yr 45 yrs Current history good health normal ECG pregnant , breast feeding use acceptable birth control method History heart disease , hypertension , renal hepatic disease , glaucoma , hyperthyroidism , Current use psychotropic medication Current dependence alcohol drug treatment drug alcohol addiction within past 5 year
